Resume

A little more about me


For the past year I have been working to further my software engineering skills and helping early-stage startup founders bring their ideas to life through a combination of design, development, and strategy work with my company River Interactive.

My last corporate role was at Fidelity Investments where I worked on several strategy consulting projects as well as two internal startups.

My strategy work consisted mostly of building financial models, analyzing large datasets and working in agile teams to craft recommendations and meeting materials for senior executives.

The startups I worked on at Fidelity were related to Bitcoin and helping the under-banked build good savings habits. My work on those projects included product management, research, financial modeling, and user experience design.

I'm originally from a small town outside of Boston, Massachusetts, and I have dual US-Irish citizenship. When I'm not working, you can find me enjoying the outdoors with friends 🌲, reading 📚, or watching the Boston Celtics 🏀 🍀
